p: C-glycosyl flavonoid vitexin has recently received increased attention due to its wide range of pharmacological effects including anticancer (as hypoxia inducible factor (HIF)-1Î± inhibitor), analgesic (via targeting TRPV1), antioxidant, hypotensive, neuroprotective, and antidiabetic effects [ 174]. It is synthesized by plants such as C. cajan, Ficus deltoidea, Passiflora incarnata, Vitex agnus-castus, and endophytic fungi such as Colletotrichum sp. from G. biloba [ 134] and Dichotomopilus funicola of C. cajan [ 153].
